typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		Category as string,
		Subcategory as string,
		Model as string,
		ListPrice as decimal(18,2),
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(18,2),
		Product as string,
		SKU as string,
		ProductKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'ProductData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ProductDataDeltaSource
ProductDataDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(ProductKey),
	Category = last(Category),
		Subcategory = last(Subcategory),
		Model = last(Model),
		ListPrice = last(ListPrice),
		Color = last(Color),
		StandardCost = last(StandardCost),
		Product = last(Product),
		SKU = last(SKU)) ~> Deduplicated1ProductDataDeltaSource
Deduplicated1ProductDataDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		Category,
		Subcategory,
		Model,
		ListPrice,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		Product,
		SKU,
		ProductKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> ProductData
ProductData select(mapColumn(
		ProductKey,
		SKU,
		Product,
		Color
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectProductData
SelectProductData select(mapColumn(
		ProductId = ProductKey,
		ItemSku = SKU,
		ProductName = Product,
		ProductColor = Color
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Product
Product sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Product',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> ProductSink
